reviewerName: Ken the G man "Ken the G man"
reviewtext: I did my research, and this model power surge protector had exactly the features I wanted, and none of the extras I would never use.Do your research, figure out what you are plugging into a surge protector, and then buy the one that suits your needs.I saved about $40 buying this item online here at amazon. The surge protector was brand new in the packaging and has worked great ! no problems.
